duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for a centralized support team that establishes a common and consistent approach for supporting NAM Danfoss Drives sales and customer programs.
Focus on supporting contract administration and assigned NAM Drives Sales Partner Programs activities.
Evaluate contracts, ensuring compliance with audit and legal requirements, and maintaining contract depository.
Provide support for NAM DDS Sales Partner Programs and new partner on-boarding in relation to approved contract terms and conditions.
Frequent interaction with various internal departments and understanding the relationship and interaction among the NAM Danfoss Drives channel partners and customers.

education_certification.credential: 2 Year Degree or equivalent work experience. Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing or related field preferred.
